about_the_game:
Owold: A Simulation Distortion

An adventure that pushes the boundaries of reality begins in an infinite world.

Owold: A Simulation Distortion offers an exploration experience that goes beyond an ordinary simulation. Take control of an extraordinary character named Olaf, who has no hands or feet, but can overcome every obstacle with his imagination and courage. Trying to survive in this world shaped by the errors and error codes of a simulation, Olaf embarks on an epic journey to save humanity from the dark side of the simulation.

In order to reshape the world, you need to go deeper at each level, overcome unknown dangers and discover the flaws of the simulation. But be careful; the simulation's errors threaten not only Olaf's path, but also your future.

This unique game immerses the player in a dynamic world by blending elements of exploration, puzzle solving and strategy. Every corner, every detail encourages you to surprise and think in the game world.

Solve complex mechanisms, find the simulation's errors, save humanity!

In Owold: A Simulation Distortion, choices that shape not only Olaf's fate but an entire world await you. Walk the fine line between reality and simulation and explore every detail for a new beginning.
